content_descriptors.notes: This is a romantic comedy visual novel game that contains mild CG nudity, mild violence and bad language. Some of the topics discussed within the game contain adult themes that are not suitable for minors.

fullgame.name: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart 2

name: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.3GHz and above
  • Memory: 512 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.3GHz and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
